column4: jchroosted-> without telling me the details i would not know..
jchroosted-> i have to doubt you, you have not told me the whole story, im guessing
jchroosted-> i dont even follow you, you mounted /dev/hda1 to /mnt/hda3/boot ? what the heck is that?
jchroosted-> i will stop because of your attitude..if you can only be honest of what you are saying
jchroosted-> lets step back..and i asked you to put my nick on your responses,
jchroosted-> okay, now i want to understand what  you have done since you booted off of liveCD ?
jchroosted-> once more, please put the my nick in front of your responses
jchroosted-> your /boot is which partition on the hard disk?
I enerted a chroot on my system that failed, lets assume I got that far on my own powers and abilities
this is not a chroot issue
grus is throwing error 15, file not found
grub is pointing at a file that no longer exist
with all that overwhelming evidence, I think its BLATANTLY obvious the problem is not chroot
I just showed you proof its not the chroot
step back because you cannot help
